Text: I've got a sound problem. The volume level just keeps changing with jumps.

Choppy audio is unfortunately a product of the way the BBC transmits its HD programmes.

In windows, the DivX Plus Codec Pack contains an aac codec that can play the audio correctly.
For those having problems with audio, I've just uploaded a transcode of the original audio to ac3.

Thanks bornintheguz 
Can anyone tell me how to add the sound file to the movie?
Thanks
